name: SmartPlaylist
description: A rebuilt and modernized plugin to create smart, rule-based playlists in Jellyfin.

versions.changelog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.7.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new Resolution rule field
* Added new Framerate rule field
* Added new Series Name rule field


### Bug Fixes
* You can now enter decimal values in integer fields (for example Community Rating)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.6.1...v10.10.7.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.7.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new Resolution rule field
* Added new Framerate rule field
* Added new Series Name rule field


### Bug Fixes
* You can now enter decimal values in integer fields (for example Community Rating)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.6.1...v10.10.7.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.6.1 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now include individual episodes from series within the Collections rule field
* Improvements to release date sorting
### Other Changes
* Code optimizations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.6.0...v10.10.6.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.6.1 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now include individual episodes from series within the Collections rule field
* Improvements to release date sorting
### Other Changes
* Code optimizations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.6.0...v10.10.6.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.6.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new IsIn/IsNotIn operator for matching multiple words
* Added new Collections rule field that searches for items belonging to a specific collection.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.5.3...v10.10.6.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.6.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new IsIn/IsNotIn operator for matching multiple words
* Added new Collections rule field that searches for items belonging to a specific collection.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.5.3...v10.10.6.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.5.3 -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* 10.10 release bump


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.5.2...v10.11.5.3

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.5.3 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed caching issue which could cause wrong contents showing up in playlists


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.5.2...v10.10.5.3
- PlaylistMediaType is now set to Video when the playlist only contains video files.
- PlaylistMediaType is now set to Video when the playlist only contains video files.

- Added support for Music Videos, thank you guluarte!
- Prevent search while playlists are loading
- Code optimizations

- Added support for Music Videos, thank you guluarte!
- Prevent search while playlists are loading
- Code optimizations
Brought up to date with 10.10 changes, see full changelog here: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/tags

Added new rule field properties:
- 'Overview': For the media item description
- 'Last Played': When the media item was last played
- 'Next Unwatched': The next unwatched episode

Other changes:
- Changed the rule field categories to make a bit more sense
- Media type pre-filtering now uses API to increase performance
- Restructured code to make it easier to add new features
Brought up to date with version 10.10 changes

- You can now set a max play time for playlists
- Split scheduled tasks into two, one for video (hourly) and one for audio (daily)
- Fixed issue with config page causing styling errors

- You can now set your own suffix/prefix or even remove them completely
- Playlists are now connected with ID instead of name

NOTE: This change comes with a lot of backend changes. Make sure your playlists have refreshed once before changing name and/or owner to avoid duplicate Jellyfin playlists

New features:
- You can now choose an item limit when playlists are generated
- Added a 'Random' sort option for playlists

Fix:
- Now works properly with all Jellyfin 10.10.x versions
- Fix: Artists fields now work properly

- Added support for Artists and Album Artists.
- Sorted rule fields into categories for better overview.

New features:
- You can now target specific users for playback fields, such as IsPlayed.
- Added support for relative date comparisons ('Newer Than' and 'Older Than')
- Added 'After' and 'Before' operators for date fields (removed 'LessThan' and 'GreaterThan')
- Added support for Release Date

Fixes:
- Fixed bug for config page event listeners when using back/forward in browser.
- Date fields now work properly
Brought changes up to date with 10.10.x version. Go here for changelog: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/releases

- Added Series media type and renamed TV Shows to Episodes for clarity
- You can now search for users as well
- More styling changes to better match Jellyfin

- You can now search for playlists under Manage Playlists
- Styling changes to better match Jellyfin
- Various other tweaks and fixes

- Fix: Playlist covers are now regenerated properly (metadata refresh) when editing and refreshing playlists.
- Changed refresh task to trigger every hour instead instead of every 30 minutes.
- Various other enhancements and stability improvements.

New features and optimizations:

- You can now choose and mix AND/OR logic when creating rules
- Option to select media type first to go well in hand with the new rules logic
- Added flexible deletion options (config only vs config + playlist)
- Added regex validation
- Added option to enable/disable playlists
- Various performance optimizations

Also switched to Jellyfin version semantics.
- Fix: Filtering strategy failed on expensive rules

Jellyfin 10.11 support and new features:

- You can now choose and mix AND/OR logic when creating rules
- Option to select media type first to go well in hand with the new rules logic
- Added flexible deletion options (config only vs config + playlist)
- Added regex validation
- Added option to enable/disable playlists
- Performance optimizations
- Works with Jellyfin 10.11.0.0-rc2

Also switched to Jellyfin version semantics.

Fixes:
- Prevent duplicate names when renaming smart playlists
- Delete old playlist when renaming a smart playlist

Optimizations:
- When creating and editing smart playlists, only refresh that specific list.
- Optimized and cleaned up code
Fix: Multiple playlists could get deleted after cancellation

New features:
- Edit existing playlists directly in the UI!
- Choose playlist owner from dropdown of all Jellyfin users
- User ID Migration: Automatic migration from usernames to User IDs for reliability

Plus some other fixes, enhancements and performance tweaks.
- Changed some log messages to DEBUG to not spam logs
- Added support for People metadata.
- Enhanced performance with optimized rule processing

Fixes:
- Playlist images are now populating again.
- Proper fix for null exception.

- New feature: Added rule field support for Audio Language
- Fix: Null reference when trying to populate playlist image cover for empty playlists
- Fix: Contains and Regex operators now match strings within lists, for example Studios.
- Added support for field rules: Is Played, Is Favorite, Play Count, Runtime, Parental Rating
- Added support for Tags field in rules.

- Works with newer Jellyfin versions
- UI to create and manage smart playlists

name: MusicTags
description: Automatically extract metadata from audio files - such as ID3 tags, Vorbis comments, and more - and convert them into standard Jellyfin tags.

versions.changelog: Added support for Jellyfin 10.11.0-rc5

- Performance enhancements
- Prevent duplicate scans running
- Now properly compatible with all Jellyfin 10.10.x versions
Removed INFO log messages to minimize log spam + some other minor changes
Initial release
